author: gnodet
msg: Remove jca flow dependency on spring

author: jeremias
msg: The font loading code now reads the encoding value from the XML font metrics file so that Type 1 fonts like Symbol and ZapfDingbats can be embedded explicitely (Required by PDF/A).

Note that it is necessary to set the encoding value in the font metrics file manually since it cannot be extracted from the PFM file reliably, i.e. for "Symbol" use "SymbolEncoding" and for "ZapfDingbats" use "ZapfDingbatsEncoding".

author: bago
msg: Workaround to avoid ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when the number of retries in RemoteDelivery config is decreased and delayed mails exists in spool (JAMES-316)

author: mmarinschek
msg: tlds should be generated to target-directory

author: bago
msg: Removed a debugging System.out from MimeMessageCopyOnWriteProxy from the previous commit.
